channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Pluribus episode 6 sees a mortified Carol make two new big discoveries about The Others – and finally teases the team-up we've been waiting for
item.description: Pluribus episode 6 is out now on Apple TV – and it doesn't make us wait for answers about its predecessor's ending.

item.title: What is the release date for Landman season 2 episode 4 on Paramount+?
item.description: Another week, another chance for Tommy to hate everything around him. But when is Landman season 2 episode 4 on Paramount+?

item.title: Check Out Highlights From WIRED’s 2025 Big Interview Event
item.description: On December 4, WIRED sat down with some of the biggest names in tech, culture, business, and science for a day full of in-depth interviews.

item.title: Former USIP Lawyer on DOGE: ‘Brass Knuckles on an Authoritarian Fist’
item.description: George Foote, who served as the outside general counsel to the US Institute of Peace, said at WIRED’s Big Interview event that DOGE operatives arrived like a “strike team.”

item.title: David Hogg to Democratic Establishment: Get the Message or Get Voted Out
item.description: At WIRED’s Big Interview event, the activist and organizer said he doesn’t “think the Chuck Schumers of the world understand” what’s coming for the party.

item.title: Nvidia boss Jensen Huang steers Trump, Congress against AI chip limits and state-level AI rules
item.description: Nvidia’s Jensen Huang successfully lobbied Trump and lawmakers against a proposed AI chip export rule and issued a warning about fragmented state regulation of AI.
